## Process.sendStdin() method

Sends data to the process stdin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendStdin(data: string, opts?: CallOpts): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | string | Data to send |
|  opts | CallOpts | _(Optional)_ Call options |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
